markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Witchcraft](/Feats.aspx?ID=1868) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 154 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Witch](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=44)

**Prerequisites**
[Witch Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1866)

</column>

---

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level [witch feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=16/feats) of your choice. Your familiar no longer has one less familiar ability than normal.

<title level="2">Basic Witchcraft leads to...</title>
[Advanced Witchcraft](/Feats.aspx?ID=1869)
name: Basic Witchcraft
